notification.title: It's time to pray {{prayer}}
body: [29:45] Recite, [O Muḥammad], what has been revealed to you of the Book and establish prayer.
Indeed, prayer prohibits immorality and wrongdoing, and the remembrance of Allah is greater.
And Allah knows that which you do.

apiError.title: Oops! Something went wrong!
apiError.message:
There may be an error with {{api}} API.
${{err}}

noInternet.title: No internet connection
noInternet.message: Check your internet connection and try again.

cityError.title: Invalid City and Country: {{input}}
cityError.message: Please seperate the city and country inputs with a single comma.
